info.description: Dualship backend API for workflow automation and API management.
info.title: Dualship API

post.description: Creates or updates Stripe products and prices for all active subscription plans. Idempotent - safe to run multiple times.

403.description: Not a member of this workspace

put.description: Update a workspace (requires owner or admin role)

get.description: Get all pending invitations for a workspace (requires owner or admin role)

Get public information about an invitation by token (no auth required)

Execute flows by project ID and flow slug. Response structure depends on flow configuration.
